description: dpkg-name - rename Debian packages to full package names

global_flags.description: If a target directory isn't found it will be created automatically.

will  be  moved  into  a  subdirectory.   If  the  directory given as argument exists the files will be moved into that directory otherwise the name of the target directory is extracted from the section field in the control part of the package.  The target directory will be «unstable/binary-architecture/section».  If the section is not found in the control, then no-section is  assumed,  and  in  this case,  as  well  as  for  sections non-free and contrib the target directory is «section/binary-architecture».  The section field is not required so a lot of packages will find their way to the no-section area.
don't create a new file, but a symlink.
